column4: hi all, i have a HP nx6120 Laptop that i think isn't displaying 1400x1050 res. I have downloaded the 810 drivers that are from http://www.fairlite.demon.co.uk/intel.html but how do i install it?
ok, if they are installed why do i not get the option to set it to 1400x1050 in the screen resolution?
do you know your screens vertical refresh and horizontal sync?
